mp3_vulnerabilities.description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the _url_canon_local_path function in url.c in libmp3lame.a in LAME 3.99.5 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted MP3 file.
mitigation: Update to the latest version of LAME
detection_methods: Inspect URL patterns in MP3 metadata

mp3_vulnerabilities.description: An issue was discovered in Mpg123 1.25.10 and 1.25.11. There is a heap-based buffer overflow in the function convert_latin1_to_utf8() in libmpg123/id3.c.
mitigation: Update to the latest version of Mpg123
detection_methods: Check ID3 tags for unexpected values

mp3_vulnerabilities.description: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability in the `read_frame_header` function in layer3.c in mp3gain 1.5.2 allows attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted MP3 file.
mitigation: Update to the latest version of mp3gain
